entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character in the story, mentioned as having set foot in the gloomiest bathroom he had ever seen.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who initially refuses to enter the girls' toilet but eventually follows Hermione into it.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry and Ron's friend, who convinces them to investigate the girls' toilet and is the first to speak to Moaning Myrtle.

entities.name: moaning myrtle
entities.description: The spirit of a girl who died in the school, mentioned as floating on the cistern of the toilet and being addressed by Hermione.

relationships.description: Hermione addresses Moaning Myrtle in the girls' toilet, showing that she is aware of Myrtle's presence.
Harry sees Moaning Myrtle floating on the cistern of the toilet, indicating that he has become aware of her existence.
